Text.Heading: Introduction
Text.Paragraph: When working with smart cards and GlobalTester there is an inherent need for some test cases to prove basic functionality of all components in the system.

This TestSpecification defines test cases that perform checks on card and try to identify the type of card used. Some of the test cases provided here go a step further and do not only identify the type of card but also some of it's parameters (e.g. supported protocols or available credit).
